what: There is a MMORPG game that was rumoured to have hit 50k online players after being up for only four hours when its vintage version was rereleased. There was a seasonal release for a doomsday game mode scenario, the goal in this mode being to become the last man standing. In this game mode powerful buffs can be obtained through killing monsters or through other players, these are split into three categories, what are those categories?

constraints: MUST attempt to answer ALL parts of the question
MUST acknowledge data sources if specified

commanders_intent: Provide a complete, structured answer addressing ALL 3 requirements
requirements: MUST answer: In this game mode powerful buffs can be obtained through killing monsters or through other players, these are split into three categories, what are those categories
MUST provide a complete answer to the question
MUST include specific details, not generalizations
